quotes.quote: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.
Not every instance requires a response. Truth resides silently in the seat of power.
To listen closely and reply well is the highest perfection we are able to attain in the art of conversation.
Someone else's action should not determine your response.
There are times when silence is the most sacred of responses.
Not being able to think of a reply is not the same thing as accepting another's words.
Response is absolutely designed for always showing up late.
The response is essential for any relationship. Otherwise, it is the rejection itself.
You do not respond to a mosquito bite with a hammer.
The impromptu reply is precisely the touchstone of the man of wit.
Our response to an offense determines our future.
The meaning of your communication is the response you get.
There are always proper responses, even to rude questions.
The healthiest response to life is joy.
It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane.
Our lives are a response to a love that we already have received.
The fundamental response to change is not logical, but emotional.
The only sane response to change is to find the opportunity in it.
The greatest response to a negative person is to be a positive person.
The proper response to difficulty is not to retreat. It is to prevail.
The only fit reply to a fit request is silence and the fact.
No response is a response.
Our emotional response is driven by the proximity of events.
Your choice is to be active or passive in your responses.
One response to feeling abandoned is to abandon yourself.
The reason can give nothing at all like the response to desire.
Our response to temptation reveals the substance of our faith.
